headline: Jim Cramer on GE HealthCare: “I Just Don’t Think It’s What You Want to Own”
summary: GE HealthCare Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:GEHC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. Noting that they own 83 shares of GEHC, a caller asked if they should sell their position. In response, Cramer said: Okay, I worked for GE, so I got, I’m not allowed to own stock. I want to make that […]
